product_name: Menasha Ridge Press Five Star Trails: Orlando
long_description: . Author: Sandra Friend. Softcover; 240 pages; color photographs and maps. Menasha Ridge Press; copyright 2012. Includes trail maps with elevation profiles and GPS coordinates, and detailed directions to the trailheads. Includes ratings for difficulty, scenery, trail conditions, solitude and accessibility for children. Hikes are grouped by interest in ancient trees, birding, dogs, boardwalks, Florida Trail segments, kids, scenery, solitude, wildlife and wildflowers. .
short_description: Five Star Trails: Orlando includes 37 beautiful hikes within a 60 min. drive of downtown Orlando.
